name: PKShippingType
desc: Complete list of valid shipping types.

items.name: case shipping
items.desc: Shipping the purchase to the provided address using a third-party shipping company. This is the default shipping type.

items.name: case delivery
items.desc: Delivering the purchase by the seller (for example, pizza, flower, or furniture delivery).

items.name: case storePickup
items.desc: Store pickup of the purchase from the sellerâ€™s store.

items.name: case servicePickup
items.desc: Picking up an item from the provided address by the service (for example, transportation or shipping services that provide home pickup).
